about_the_game:
"MATURE WORLD OF ART: BEAUTIES and BEASTS"
Is a DLC only for mature audiences, rated 16+.

Package includes 30 additional paintings for Your WOA Collection.
In this DLC You will find works of art by Jan Brueghel the Younger, Peter Rubens,
Paul Cezanne, Henri Rousseau, Edvard Munch, Paul Gauguin to name few.
Enjoy and All the best!

Please keep in mind this DLC is for adult Users only.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC includes mature content like nudity, violence or alcohol consumption presented on Masterpieces included in the game as puzzles. All of this content is a classical art and should be treated as such.
